Penance {1}{W}{W}{W} [i](If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.)[/i]
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put any number of creature cards from among them with total mana value [b][3][/b] or less onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
